summary: All requirements (REQ-29 through REQ-33) appear to be implemented with extensive console logging added to backend (main.mo) and frontend files (useIsAdmin.ts, AdminDashboard.tsx, Layout.tsx). Backend logging for actor initialization, isCallerAdmin calls, and admin HashSet contents is visible. Frontend logging tracks query execution, actor state, raw responses, and UI rendering decisions. No evidence found for REQ-33 (migration.mo logging), likely due to file truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that the backend migration.mo file correctly preserves the admins HashSet during canister upgrades, ensuring that the principal 'mhpch-6hb2j-phylo-7bgid-lmdtt-nd4to-wuert-h3mxk-4jz53-6meuu-iqe' remains in the admin list after upgrades, and add console logging to the migration process to confirm admin principals are being transferred
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of migration.mo modifications in the diff. The file is not listed in modified or added files. Backend logging appears only in main.mo.
